Package hypeerweb.broadcast

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Visitor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcastVisitor
    Broadcasts a message from a source node to all nodes in the HyPeerWeb.
    Contents
    An arbitrary collection of named objects
    Parameters
    An arbitrary collection of named objects
    SendVisitor
    Used to send a message from a source node to a target node.
